              QUICKLY

speaker:

              QUICKLY

speaker:

fire.

              QUICKLY

text: warrant you, no telltale nor no breed-bate. His

speaker:

              QUICKLY
text: fault. But let that pass. Peter Simple you say your

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              QUICKLY
text: name is?

              QUICKLY
text: And Master Slender’s your master?

speaker: SIMPLE

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              QUICKLY
text: Does he not wear a great round

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              QUICKLY
text: beard like a glover’s paring knife?

text: No, forsooth. He hath but a little wee face,

speaker: SIMPLE
text: with a little yellow beard, a Cain-colored beard.

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              QUICKLY
text: A softly-sprited man, is he not?

speaker: SIMPLE
text: Ay, forsooth. But he is as tall a man of his

speaker: SIMPLE
text: hands as any is between this and his head. He hath

speaker: SIMPLE
text: fought with a warrener.

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              QUICKLY
text: How say you? O, I should remember

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              QUICKLY
text: him. Does he not hold up his head, as it were,

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              QUICKLY
text: and strut in his gait?

speaker: SIMPLE

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              QUICKLY
text: Well, heaven send Anne Page no

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              QUICKLY
text: worse fortune! Tell Master Parson Evans I will do

speaker:

              QUICKLY
text: what I can for your master. Anne is a good girl, and

speaker:

              QUICKLY
text: I wish—

speaker:

stay long.

text: Vat is you sing? I do not like dese toys.

              CAIUS
text: Pray you, go and vetch me in my closet un boîtier

speaker:

              CAIUS
text: vert, a box, a green-a box. Do intend vat I speak?

              CAIUS
text: Fe, fe, fe, fe! Ma foi, il fait fort chaud. Je

              CAIUS

              CAIUS

              CAIUS

              CAIUS
